name: Cary_Grant
text:
Cary Grant
Cary Grant was an actor.
When Dale Cooper and Ed Hurley disguised themselves to lure Jacques Renault from One Eyed Jacks, Blackie O'Reilly remarked that Cooper looked like Grant.
Behind the scenes
Cary Grant (January 18, 1904 – November 29, 1986) was an English-born American actor known primarily for his work from the 1930s until his retirement in 1966.
Kyle MacLachlan portrayed Grant's spirit in the 2004 film Touch of Pink.
